name: Class Arc2D.Double
text: This class defines an arc specified in double precision.
codes:
public static class Arc2D.Double
extends Arc2D
implements Serializable

fields.description:
The X coordinate of the upper-left corner of the framing
 rectangle of the arc.

The Y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the framing
 rectangle of the arc.

The overall width of the full ellipse of which this arc is
 a partial section (not considering the angular extents).

The overall height of the full ellipse of which this arc is
 a partial section (not considering the angular extents).
The starting angle of the arc in degrees.
The angular extent of the arc in degrees.

methods.description:
Returns the X coordinate of the upper-left corner of
 the framing rectangle in double precision.
 Note that the arc
 partially inscribes
 the framing rectangle of this RectangularShape.

Returns the Y coordinate of the upper-left corner of
 the framing rectangle in double precision.
 Note that the arc
 partially inscribes
 the framing rectangle of this RectangularShape.

Returns the width of the framing rectangle in
 double precision.
 Note that the arc
 partially inscribes
 the framing rectangle of this RectangularShape.

Returns the height of the framing rectangle
 in double precision.
 Note that the arc
 partially inscribes
 the framing rectangle of this RectangularShape.
Returns the starting angle of the arc.
Returns the angular extent of the arc.

Determines whether the RectangularShape is empty.
 When the RectangularShape is empty, it encloses no
 area.

methods.method_sig:
public void setArc (double x,
                   double y,
                   double w,
                   double h,
                   double angSt,
                   double angExt,
                   int closure)
methods.description:
Sets the location, size, angular extents, and closure type of
 this arc to the specified double values.

Sets the starting angle of this arc to the specified double
 value.

Sets the angular extent of this arc to the specified double
 value.

methods.method_sig:
protected Rectangle2D makeBounds (double x,
                                 double y,
                                 double w,
                                 double h)
methods.description:
Constructs a Rectangle2D of the appropriate precision
 to hold the parameters calculated to be the framing rectangle
 of this arc.
